LinkPlayers.Title: Link Players
LinkPlayers.Heading: Link Players to Garrison
LinkPlayers.Description: Choose which Adventure you are running, and then link players to their characters

Settings.Endpoint.Name: Endpoint
Settings.Endpoint.Hint: The Garrison endpoint to use. Only change this if you know what you're doing.
Settings.ApiKey.Name: API Key
Settings.ApiKey.Hint: Your API key, obtained from your Garrison server. Do NOT share this.
